episodes.title: Celebs Are Not #RelationshipGoals ft. Who? Weekly
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week Laura and Angela welcome Lindsey Weber, co-host of the Who? Weekly podcast. We discuss mediocre celebrity couples, dating clones, and a feud with Jesse Tyler Ferguson. 

This week's episode is brought to you by Adam and Eve, MVMT Watches, and Squarespace.

episodes.title: Own Your Sex Appeal ft. Model & Comedian Syd Wilder
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Youtube star and sexy lady Syd Wilder joins us this week to talk boob jobs, sex tapes and encourage Laura and Angela to take a nude photo shoot featuring alpacas. Things get interesting. 

This week's episode is brought to you by Lyft and Squarespace.

episodes.title: STD Shaming Will Kill You ft. Jennifer Wright
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week, we welcome back one of our favorite guests, author Jennifer Wright! Jennifer's new book, Get Well Soon, is all about plagues which, you may be surprised to learn, does have something to do with dating! Join us as we chat syphilis, hero Uber drivers, and why you shouldn't suggest staying "friends" with every person you dump.

This week's episode is brought to you by Spring, Thred Up, and Blue Apron!

episodes.title: Valentines Day Special 2017
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week, Laura and Angela are each other's Valentines. That means awkward gift exchanges, tales of V-days past and lot's of candy. Join us and let's get romantical!

This week's episode is sponsored by Adam and Eve, BioClarity, and Squarespace.

episodes.title: Changing People Never Works
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week Laura and Angela discover an app that busts cheaters that are using Tinder, a study that makes them feel ok about seeking out revenge, and the kind of guy most likely to give you an orgasm (spoiler: being attractive is a factor). Then we breakdown why changing people never works with a little help from Tai from Clueless. 

This week's episode is sponsored by Adam & Eve (www.adameve.com) offer code: SINGLE

BioClarity (www.bioclarity.com) offer code: SINGLE

MVMT Watches (www.mvmtwatches.com/single) 

Show them some love!

episodes.title: It's Okay to Always Be a Bridesmaid ft. Professional bridesmaid Jen Glantz
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week we welcome professional bridesmaid and author Jen Glantz and find out how a Craigslist ad for desperate brides turned into a whole business. We also chat about how often ladies get cold feet before walking down the aisle, give feedback on a listener's bridezilla horror stories, and go over the do's and don'ts of bridesmaid etiquette.

This week's episode is sponsored by BioClarity, Spring, and Blue Apron!

episodes.title: What Doesn't Kill You Makes You Stronger
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week Laura and Angela channel the goddess Kelly Clarkson's almighty anthem. We also talk about how cat poop could be affecting your sex life, how diamonds are actually worthless, and answer a listener who slept with 2 of her ex's best friends.

This episode is sponsored by Squarespace!(www.squarespace.com) Offer Code: SINGLE

episodes.title: It's Okay to be a Hot Mess Sometimes ft. The Hot Mess Girls
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
It's an all-lady podcasting party this week when we are joined by Emily Lubin and Andrea Allan, the girls of the Hot Mess Comedy Hour podcast. They share their biggest hot mess moments (which involve a burrito and mailing clipped finger nails) and then we answer a listener whose boyfriend was sexting with his sister-in-law. Yikes.

This week's episode is brought to you by Lola! (www.mylola.com / offer code: single)    (*code is lowercase*)
and BioClarity! (www.bioclarity.com / offer code: SINGLE)

episodes.title: New Year, New You
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Happy New Year! This week, Laura and Angela compare resolutions, get the details we never knew we wanted about strap-ons, explore the sexual fantasies of the asexual, and help out a nice Pagan lady with dating woes! Starting 2017 off with a bang.

This week's episode is brought to you by BioClarity and Squarespace!

episodes.title: Hooking Up Around the World
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
The ladies get all international this week talking about the joys of cross-cultural relationships. We also explore the phenomenon of Scrotox, the 1 orgasm a day challenge, and douchebags at airports. 

This week's episode is brought to you by BioClarity!

episodes.title: Unleash Your Inner Queen ft. Drag Queen Sherry Vine
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Legendary NYC Drag Queen Sherry Vine joins us to talk about marrying people on the subway and why she'd like to date another queen. Then we talk Tinder for airplanes, men drinking "girly" drinks and play the game WWQD (What Would Queens Do?).

episodes.title: Go Big or Go Home ft. Cosmo's Julie Vadnal
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Julie Vadnal, senior editor at Cosmopolitan (*sexyyy*), joins us to talk about what happens when you let dating experts take over your love life. Then we tell you all what underwear we're wearing and decide what counts as a deal-breaker (surprisingly, that doesn't include being a professional square dancer!)

This week's episode is brought to you by Adam and Eve, Blue Apron, and FrameBridge!

episodes.title: What It's Like to Date a Couple ft. Unicorn Alana Heiss
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Alana Heiss teaches us that a unicorn is not a mythical creature and is, in fact, a girl that dates couples! After that we chat about vagina decorations for your Xmas tree and what you should do when a guy with a girlfriend starts flirting with you.

This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace, MVMT Watches, Blue Apron

episodes.title: Sexual Compatibility Or Bust ft. Billy Procida
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Comedian Billy Procida (The Manwhore Podcast) joins us and answers all our questions about his open relationship and how to navigate a sex party! Then we talk clown porn, being the only single person at a wedding, and nose fetishes. 

This week's episode is bought to you by Adam and Eve, Blue Apron, and Leesa!

episodes.title: Meeting the Parents Is Hard ft. Instagrammer Sarah Merrill
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Sarah Merrill, the funny lady behind @BigKidProblems, joins us to chat about a new type of retainer than enhances oral sex, the meaning behind that sext you just sent and the time her boyfriend's mom walked in on her watching the sex scene from Cruel Intentions. Awkward.

This week's episode is brought to you by MVMT Watches and Framebridge.

episodes.title: It's Not Just About You
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week, it's just the two of us talking about the election's effects on our libidos (bad), a smart tip for your Tinder bio (good), and whether or not it's creepy to show up at your crush's workplace (undecided). 

This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace.

episodes.title: Know How To Make a Comeback ft. Taylor Strecker
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Fan favorite Taylor Strecker is back and she's got big news! (Spoiler: She's dating a lady now). We also chat about our parents having sex, the affects of drinking pineapple juice on your vadge and Laura's Ayahuasca trip! 

This week's episode is brought to you by Leesa, THINX, and Adam and Eve!

episodes.title: The Election Broke Us All ft. Jaye McBride
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Comic Jaye McBride joins us to talk about what it's like dating as a trans woman in a small town. Then we all get political, chatting about dating Trump supporters and the psychology behind the "I Voted" sticker!

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron and Adam and Eve

episodes.title: Couples Costumes Are Spooking Your Boo
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: It's a very spookkyyy Halloween episode! Angela and Laura discuss cheaters, couple's costumes VS. friend group costumes and a listener who wants to cancel a Halloween party just because she is jealous of her co-host's boyfriend. Boo!

episodes.title: Age Is Just a Number ft Dr. Karin Anderson Abrell
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week, relationship expert Dr. Karin Anderson Abrell tells us all about the time she called off a wedding two months before it was supposed to happen. Then we talk about timelines, shady dudes on Bumble and "the P word!"

This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace, MVMT, and Leesa.

episodes.title: You Can't Agree On a Date Spot
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week, the girls are obsessed with Laura's dog, who is now a viral internet sensation. They also reminisce on hooking up in cars, question matching with friends on dating apps and agree that a "good" date is subjective.

This week's episode is brought to you by Adam and Eve!

episodes.title: Your Imagination Runs Wild
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
The girls discuss a very important email they received (spoiler: we are indirectly responsible for an engagement). Then get into the worst form of cheating and what to do if you're dating someone with no sexual desire! 

This week's episode is brought to you by SquareSpace and Smile Direct Club!

episodes.title: You Live for Other People
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: The girls talk about how sober-living can be awkward for dating, confront long term partner's dating historys, and analyze who our moms want us to fuck!

episodes.title: The Grass Is Always Greener
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: The girls are shocked to learn how long the average American is having sex (longer than one of us!), intrigued by the idea of doing laundry on a date, and stumped by an intense game of Would You Rather.

episodes.title: You Recycle Old Relationships ft. Comedian Cristina Cote
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Comedian Cristina Cote (and her Russian model alter ego Svetlana) join us to chat rejection, fetishes and the joy of running into Bumble matches IRL.

This week's episode is brought to you by Blue Apron!

episodes.title: You Haven't Embraced Your Inner Nerd ft. DragonFruit dating app CEO
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week, we are joined by self-proclaimed geek Orie Enav, the founder of DragonFruit, a dating app for nerds! We chat about blocking people on dating apps, humblebrags and our own personal geekdoms (linguistics, anybody?).

This week's episode is sponsored by Squarespace!

episodes.title: You're Passive Aggressive
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week, it's just us girls talking about awkward bikini waxes, lessons learned from threesomes and outgrowing friends.

This week's episode is sponsored by Squarespace!

episodes.title: You're Slut-Shaming Yourself ft. Lisa Klienman
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week, comedian Lisa Klienman (Refinery29's Sexxess) joins us to chat shaving in front of significant others, friends with benefits and the S-word.

This week's episode is brought to you by TrackR

episodes.title: You Need Boob Confidence
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
It's just the two of us this week! Things get very personal when we talk about stray boob hairs, Olympians we may or may not have canoodled with and the weird side effects of birth control.

This week's episode is brought to you by Tidal and Squarespace!

episodes.title: You Don't Know Dating Lingo ft. Tessa Hersh
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week we welcome funny-lady Tessa Hersh (UCB, Truth Fairy) and find out why you should order the same meal as your date, how to send a confirmation text and what DGYF stands for (Spoiler: Dang Girl You Fine).

This week's episode is brought to you by Blue Apron!

episodes.title: You Need to Focus on You ft. Trans Playwright Tobly McSmith
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week we welcome playwright Tobly McSmith (Katdashians, Showgirls the Musical) who tells us what it's like to date as a trans man in NYC and about his past as a slave to a dominatrix. Then we get into Pokémon Go-inspired sex toys, trace the origin of the female orgasm and learn how to love ourselves (not in the masturbation kind of way).

This episode was sponsored by Blue Apron and TrackR!

episodes.title: One-Year Anniversary Special!
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Paaaarrttyy! We celebrate our one year podcast anniversary by looking back on our favorite episodes. We also get life updates from some of our most popular listeners and guests, including Scott Rogowsky (who is dating our listeners?!) and Stephen from SXSW (got dumped by his GF for coming on the show?!).

episodes.title: Your Type Sucks ft. Elliott Brooks
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
The lovely Elliott Brooks (currently starring as Khloe in the Off-Broadway hit KATdashians!) joins us to talk about how Pokémon Go is more popular than porn, falling for her handsome trans boyfriend, and, yes, the Kardashians.

This week's episode is sponsored by Blue Apron.

episodes.title: You Have A Secret - Shhh!
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Laura and Angela tackle intense listener questions like "What should I do if my guy has a fetish for watching me sleep?" and "Should I keep dating a Trump supporter?". Yikes. Then we reveal secrets in a game of Never Have I Ever.

This week's episode is sponsored by TrackR!

episodes.title: There's No Time to Date
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: This week the girls dive into the phenomenon of "benching," hear from a listener who got ghosted after losing her virginity and finally compete for how many swipes and matches they can get in under 10 seconds.

episodes.title: Everybody Good Is Taken
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Laura and Angela go one-on-one to figure out why people flirt on airplanes, how to date when you're a lady with a disability and if Nickleback is a deal-breaker.

episodes.title: Dating Is Expensive
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: It's just Angela and Laura this week! We talk about how often ladies are turned on, Grey's Anatomy-style dating in hospitals, and C-list stars in Laura's home. We also review some of our favorite (and meanest) listener emails and comments!

episodes.title: You're Too Nice ft. Broad City's Arturo Castro
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Arturo Castro (everyone's favorite stoner roommate from Broad City) joins us to talk about his perfect girlfriend, being "barely straight," cry-gasms and virgins!

This week's episode is sponsored by Squarespace and TrackR.

episodes.title: You Don't Know When to Sleep with Him
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Laura and Angela have a heart-to-heart about what happens when your double date companions show up stoned. Then we are shocked when Cosmo tells us out how many men fake orgasms and play our own version of strip poker.

This episode is sponsored by Blue Apron!

episodes.title: You Don't Know Where to Meet People
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Laura and Angela catch up! Laura learns her husband is going to see his ex at a wedding and Angela explains why her boyfriend calls her "Angie Boo Boo Hamilton." Then we brainstorm pickup lines for any occasion.

episodes.title: You Like Drama ft. Johnathan Fernandez
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Comedian Johnathan Fernandez (UCB, Girls, upcoming Lethal Weapon reboot) joins us and tells us about his days as a male cheerleader (it's how he met his wife!). Then we get into the possible positive side effects of mushrooms and question whether a half-hour counts as long-distance.

episodes.title: Cockblocks Suck
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
It's just Laura and Angela this week! Things get intimate as we discuss what happened when we both tried Elvie, the high-tech keigel weight. We also get into an app to catch cheaters, "second-tier friends," and different types of cockblocks.

This week's episode is sponsored by Blue Apron.

episodes.title: You're in the Friendzone ft. Catie Lazarus
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Catie Lazarus (host of Employee of the Month podcast) joins us as we learn about Tinder's most right-swiped jobs, what happens when you hook up with a friend and how to dump someone before you even meet them.

This week's episode is sponsored by Blue Apron and Lonely and Horny, Jake and Amir's new series on Vimeo!

episodes.title: You Don't Make the First Move ft. Scott Rogowsky
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
We welcome our first returning guest – comedian Scott Rogowsky – and Laura confronts him about the date he doesn't remember they went on. Then and we find out why men love big boobs, how to order porn with Emojis, and we help one listener figure out how to get out of the Friendzone and move on.

This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace and Blue Apron.

episodes.title: You Need Vagina Confidence ft. Dr. Nikki Goldstein
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Australian sexologist Dr. Nikki Goldstein stops by to school us on all things vagina, teach us about "fomosexuality" and how to find out where your "A-spot us" (hint: it will give you a new kind of orgasm that your g-spot can't).

episodes.title: No One Is Forever 21 ft Comedian Katie Haller
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: This week, Laura and Angela are joined by stand-up comedian Katie Haller. The ladies talk about passive-aggressiveness,  working with an ex and granny panties.

episodes.title: You're Bad at Small Talk ft Comedian Josh Ruben
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: The girls are joined by fellow Headgum podcaster Josh Ruben (Josh's Mindhouse) who tells us what happened when he ran into his decade-old ex at SXSW. Then we read a study about when the right time to fart in front of a significant other is and try to step up our small talk game.

episodes.title: You're Not Dating Enough People ft. The Bachelor's Jenna Burke
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Laura and Angela welcome former Bachelor contestant Jenna Burke who divulges behind-the-scenes secrets of the hit show and tells us why she's said good-bye to men for now and started dating women. Then the ladies help a listener unsure about when to sleep with a new guy and finish up with a round of everyone's favorite game - Fuck, Marry, Kill.

This episode was brought to you by Squarespace.

episodes.title: You Need a New Profile Pic ft. Badoo's Alexandra Chong
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Laura and Angela chat with dating app Badoo's President, Alexandra Chong to learn all about their new anti-Catfishing technology and the difference between dating in the US and UK. Then we discuss advancements in male birth control pill, a new adoption trend and give some listeners advice about teeth whitening strips and dating in your 30s.

episodes.title: Sexting Is Hard
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Laura explains how she reacted when she saw a girl flirting with her man and Angela admits to the under-appreciated skill she discovered about her boyf during their recent travels. They ladies help a listener plan his girlfriend's dream proposal and discuss the app to make a new BFF and find out why couples have similar immune systems. Then they divulge their #failed attempts at sexting while analyzing this week's reason of the week: Sexting is hard.

episodes.title: Live at SXSW: You're Better At Sex Than You Think
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Hello Austin Texas! This week Laura and Angela storm the live stage and break down loud neighbor sex, good music for a strip tease, and the most searched porn in America. An audience member joins us on stage  for a question, and we finish up with some top self sex moves. 

This week's episode was brought to you by Red Flags!

episodes.title: You Can't Get Over Your Ex ft. Hilary Winston
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Our girl crush Hilary Winston (author of "My Boyfriend Wrote a Book About Me" and writer for My Name is Earl, Community, Happy Endings, Bad Teacher) joins the show to talk about how to get over exes, why the most highly confident college dudes have the least success in online dating, what actually determines penis size and whether to go out with a guy who asked you our when he had a girlfriend!

This week's episode is brought to you by SquareSpace and Blue Apron!

episodes.title: You're Too Worried About a Timeline ft. Keisha Zollar & Andrew Kimler
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Laura and Angela welcome HBO's upcoming Divorce guest star Keisha Zollar & her husband (and Laura and Angela's sketch show co-star!) Andrew Kimler. The couple star in the Emmy-winning docu series, The Skin Deep, and get personal about relationship bathroom boundaries. Then we answer one listener's conundrum about following bro codes when it comes to dating and discuss how concerned you should be about following a relationship timeline.

This week's episode is brought to you by Southern Comfort and Red Flags.

episodes.title: Dating Etiquette Is Confusing ft. Lauren Crouch
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Laura and Angela welcome a guest from across the pond, Lauren Crouch (nobaddatesjustgoodstories.tumblr.com), who recently went viral when a guy texted her and asked for the money back from their coffee date after she rebuked his offer for a second date. We talk about how there is no such thing as being too picky and having virtual sex with holograms!

This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace, Tidal, and Blue Apron.

episodes.title: You Can't Keep Track of All Your Boos
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Laura and Angela recap their wild Valentine's Day (hint: it involves less bedroom antics but does involve tourists hotspots and meeting lots of podcast listeners). We discuss Valentine's Day news stories, listener questions and our close friend's conundrum: what are the Valentine's Day obligations of a guy you just started dating?

episodes.title: You Enjoy Flying Solo Ft. Chiara Atik
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week, author and playwright Chiara Atik (Modern Dating: A Field Guide) joins us to brainstorm Valentine's Day gift ideas for your pals. Then we let Google autocomplete our dating profiles and run down the craziest toys sold at the AVN Adult Entertainment Porn Convention, all before diving into our reason of the week!

Want to catch Laura, Angela, and Chiara live? Join us all at our group reading at The Strand in NYC on 2/12!

This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace and Blue Apron and Tidal.

episodes.title: You Mix Business with Pleasure ft. Matthew Robert Gehring and Morgan Ferretti
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: This week, Laura and Angela are prepping for their run of live Valentine's Day shows by welcoming their co-stars Matthew Robert Gehring and Morgan Ferretti. Together, we talk masturbating at work,  OKCupid trends and why you should be cautious about dating a co-worker (unrelated to the whole masturbation thing...).

episodes.title: You're a Stalker
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
It's just Laura and Angela this week! The girls are talking about that time Laura was asked to be a celebrity butt double, rejection, haikus, and finally diving into the reason of the week - You're a Stalker!

This week's episode is brought to you by Mack Weldon, Squarespace, and Blue Apron.

episodes.title: Online Dating Is Superficial ft. Black Men Can't Jump
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week, Jonathan Braylock, Jerah Milligan and James III (Black Men Can't Jump in Hollywood podcast) join us to passionately discuss "sex tourism," how long you should wait before asking someone out after a breakup, and how your favorite movie could mean the difference between a right swipe and a left swipe.
 
This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace.

episodes.title: You Travel in Packs
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Laura and Angela talk anniversaries, the right way to breathe during sex, going out in an intimidatingly large groups, and more in this week's episode!

episodes.title: Text Messages Are Confusing ft. Taylor Strecker
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Laura and Angela decipher text messages, divorce, the worst proposal in history, and how to get out of a relationship you don't want to be in with Sirius XM radio host Taylor Strecker! (Wake up with Taylor!)

episodes.title: You Can't Take No for an Answer ft. Jennifer Wright
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: This week we welcome Jennifer Wright, author of It Ending Badly, the hilarious and wicked smart book about historically bad breakups. Also on the show:  why men always assume you're flirting, and anit-catfishing apps! We finish up with some listener questions.

episodes.title: You Want a Rom-Com Romance ft. Jasmine Lobe
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: We sit down with Jasmine Lobe (New York Observer) to talk about Snap Chat cheaters, high heels, and to answer the burning hot sexy sex questions of our listeners!

episodes.title: It's Not Relationship Season ft. J Swipe's David Yarus
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Brrr... it's cold outside – must be Cuffing Season! We break down what the seasons mean for your relationship alongside David Yarus, the founder of JSwipe, the self-proclaimed Tinder for Jewish singles. He gives tips for the perfect opening line on dating apps and then we brainstorm our dream dating apps (hint: one is an app that helps you dump someone).

episodes.title: You Avoid Conflict
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week the ladies talk about  how often couples should have sex, the latest dating apps you might want to join, social media etiquette and dating and what Laura learned from a love guru. 

This episode is brought to you by Squarespace and Skurt.

episodes.title: You Need a Good Wingman
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Having a good wingman, winglady or wingwoman is important! This week the ladies talk about: the hottest names on dating apps and how dogs make friends for their humans. We also talk about high school reunions, horrible prom stories and breakdown the single stories from some of our favorite listener submissions ever!

episodes.title: First Dates Are Awkward ft. Katie Hartman
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: This week, we welcome the hilarious Katie Hartman (Skinny Bitch Jesus Meeting, Made to Order) to talk about eating spaghetti on her prom night. We also discuss breakups, our worst dates, and devise responses for some of our listeners’ very aggressive Tinder messages. And then we play a drinking game!

episodes.title: Picking Someone Up Is Hard ft. Twinnovation
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: This week we welcome the guys from the Twinnovation podcast to talk about what it's like dating when you're a twin and what to never say to a twin. We also discuss the most popular types of porn for men and women and we answer your burning listener questions: Should a single mom write about her child on her dating profile? And should a guy message his classmate crush who is sending him hot and cold messages? We have the answer.

episodes.title: You Don't Know How to Compromise ft. Our Real Life Baes
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Laura and Angela invite their real life significant others on the show – Laura's hub, Nic, and Angela's bf, Ian – to get real about their own relationship. The guys answer questions including what they liked better about being single and more importantly, if their lady was a sound, what sound would she be? We also talk about love words from different languages, sex trends throughout history and we dive into a listener's Tinder mailbox. 

This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace.

episodes.title: You're Selling Yourself Short ft. Chris Roberti
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Chris Roberti (High Maintenance, Bankrukt Productions) joins us to discuss college virgins, successful pickup lines, the tinder in box, and finally self esteem. Check out Chris' show "A Cult of Relentless Positivity" at UCB Franklin in LA Friday November 6th, 7 PM (https://franklin.ucbtheatre.com/performance/42518). 

Also check out the twitter feed for info about the upcoming Reddit AMA- https://twitter.com/youresingleshow  !

episodes.title: You Want a Great 'How We Met' Story
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Why do Millennials worry more about romance than finance? Should you be getting gyno advice from your bestie? Angela goes to a strip club. Laura hears about a bad date. The listeners chime in with a fella worried about an age difference. We finish up by crafting a great 'How We Met' story. 

This week's episode is bought to you by Blue Apron.

episodes.title: You're Insta Dating ft. Scott Rogowsky
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Scott Rogowsky is funny, tall, eligible, and he's the guest host this week as the girls mostly discuss Laura's old roommate!? They also discuss hooking up on weed, the things that men and women look for when seeking a partner, and lastly they consider the effects of InstaDating: ordering humans to date like items off of a take out menu. 

This week's episode is brought to by Squarespace and BallPark Beef Jerky.

episodes.title: You're Dating a Man Child ft. Jake Hurwitz and Amir Blumenfeld
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week the girls welcome the HeadGum founding fathers Jake and Amir to the podcast and get their highly coveted dating advice.  We review the Burning Man missed connections, an app for bacon lovers, and what it means to be a Man Child. It turns out that both Jake and Amir are real grown ups. Oh and remember that time that Jake and Laura went to Burning Man together? Needless to say, this episode gets very real. 

This episode was brought to you by Ball Park Beef Jerky and Blue Apron.

episodes.title: You Keep Going on Bad Dates
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: This week we find out what makes a penis look good as well as why it's apparently a bad month to be a cheater. Did Angela's friend meet a dude on Grindr while at separate bachelor parties in a strip club? Yes! Yes he did! Also we dive into Angela's wildly popular OKCupid mailbox. Finally we cap it all off with a bad date Mad Libs. This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace and Dollar Shave Club.

episodes.title: You Have FOMO ft. Stassi Schroeder
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: This week the girls are joined by Stassi Schroeder (Bravo's "Vanderpump Rules," 'Straight up with Stassi' Podcast) to chat about being bold, how many people we sleep with, and how your FOMO distracts you from your significant other. Not sure if you have FOMO or think you don't? Do not fret, we administer a quiz to help you find out. We also discuss the complications of the LDR. This week's episode is brought to you by Dollar Shave Club.

episodes.title: You Ask Too Many People for Advice
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Angela is heading to Hawaii to get Lei'd, but her boyfriend's parents will be there too and that's awesome, that's great, she loves them! Laura was in love with her gay best friend in high school and watched her first porn with him though he fell asleep. Also we unpack the sexual appeal of Lampy in the Brave Little Toaster. Finally Laura displays her vocal range as we explore the many types of people you ask for dating advice. Everyone knows you should primarily be getting dating advice from here: http://thisiswhyyouresinglebook.com/

This week's episode is brought to you by MeUndies and Next Issue.

episodes.title: You Don't Know How to Meet People IRL ft. Jordan Carlos
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Jordan Carlos is just about everywhere these days and we know why- he's the best- even the studio dog instantly falls in love with him. Does it seem like he's the go to funny man for relationship roles? Well maybe that's because he's a true sweet heart. The girls jump right in and pick his lovely brain on everything from tinder FOMO to 'waiting at the airport' vids. We break down a listener submission from our boy Colin and then we find out what kind of pickup lines would work on Jordan if he wasn't so married. Ah well.
This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace, Dollar Shave Club, and Next Issue.

episodes.title: You Leave No Mystery
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week Laura and Angela discover a dating service based on your browser history and some boxers that help men conceal their boners. Angela matches with an ex-crush on Tinder and then we dive into the treasure trove that is her OKCupid mailbox. Finally the girls test their ability to discern when it's a good time in the dating process to reveal deep dark secrets. How much mystery is too much mystery? How much is not enough? Will you know after this episode? It's truly a mystery!
This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace and MeUndies.

episodes.title: You're Obsessed with Labeling Your Relationship ft: Dr. Alex Schiller
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary: Dr. Alex Schiller, creator of Never Sleep Alone, drops by to help answer some listener questions. She is not here to make friends people, she is here to get you laid. We also talk about what it means to put a label on things and the REALLY easy way to know if someone is a psychopath.

episodes.title: You Don't Know How to Advertise Yourself
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
What is life like with a giant silicon penis? It's as bad as it sounds. The girls then dig into Angela's OkCupid mail box, and we check out what's up in dating news. Lastly we help you upgrade your online dating profiles as the girls break down what makes a good advertisement for your self. With advice like this, you'll be someone's bae before you know it!
This week's episode is brought to you by NatureBox.

episodes.title: Ur Txts R Ridic
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
This week Laura and Angela talk about art projects to get back at exes, gaining weight after a wedding, niche dating websites, and then we get into the listener questions. Finally we learn the does and dont's of txting ur boo or bae!

This week's episode is brought to you by NatureBox.

episodes.title: You're Cuddle Horny
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
The ladies discuss what happens when you find and hook up with your neighbor on Tinder, Laura gets hit on by a super nervous guy. We dig into Cosmo, astrology, and then Angela's OKCupid inbox. Finally we cap it off by breaking down the hottest cuddle positions you've always wanted to try.
This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace and NatureBox.

episodes.title: You're Calling Dibs on Everyone
episodes.author: This Is Why You're Single
episodes.summary:
Laura Lane and Angela Spera talk lingerie, loud sex, and why you can't call 'Dibs' on a human being. If you like what you hear check out their book available December 8th at thisiswhyyouresinglebook.com! This podcast is part of the HeadGum network, produced by Nic Rad at Tipjar studios.

This week's episode is brought to you by Squarespace and NatureBox.
